events.name: New Email Received
events.description: Triggered when a new email is received in your mailbox.

events.name: New channel in Teams
events.description: Triggered when a new channel is created in Teams channel.

events.name: Teams Meeting Joined
events.description: Triggered when the user joins a Teams meeting.

events.name: File uploaded
events.description: Triggered when a new file is uploaded to OneDrive.

parameters.name: folder_path
parameters.description: Path of the folder where the file is uploaded.

events.name: File modified
events.description: Triggered when a file is modified in OneDrive.

parameters.name: folder_path
parameters.description: Path of the folder where the file is updated.

events.name: Event has started
events.description: Triggered when an event has started in your calendar.

events.name: Event created
events.description: Triggered when a new event is created in your calendar.

events.name: Presence changed
events.description: Triggered when the user's presence status changes.

events.name: Send an Email
events.description: Send an email from your mailbox.

parameters.name: recipient
parameters.description: Email address of the recipient.

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Subject of the email.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Content of the email body.

events.name: Mark Email as read/unread
events.description: Mark an email as read or unread.

parameters.name: email_id
parameters.description: ID of the email to mark.

parameters.name: is_read
parameters.description: Set to true to mark as read, false to mark as unread.

events.name: Send a message to a channel
events.description: Send a message to a Teams channel.

parameters.name: team_name
parameters.description: Name of the teams.

parameters.name: channel_name
parameters.description: Name of the Teams channel.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Content of the message.

events.name: Create a File in OneDrive
events.description: Create a new file in OneDrive with specific content.

parameters.name: folder_path
parameters.description: Path to the folder in OneDrive where the file will be created.

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: Name of the file to create.

parameters.name: file_content
parameters.description: Content to write into the newly created file.

events.name: Write to a File in OneDrive
events.description: Write content to a specific file in OneDrive.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path of the file in OneDrive to write to (including the file name).

parameters.name: file_content
parameters.description: Content to write into the file.

events.name: Create a folder
events.description: Create a new folder in OneDrive.

parameters.name: parent_folder_path
parameters.description: Path of the parent folder.

parameters.name: folder_name
parameters.description: Name of the new folder.

events.name: Create a Calendar Event
events.description: Create a new event in your calendar.

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: The subject of the event.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start time of the event (ISO 8601 format).

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End time of the event (ISO 8601 format).

parameters.name: attendees
parameters.description: Comma-separated email addresses of attendees.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location of the event.
